title: Aural set, sonata - first vs second section 2

content.description: You will hear a passage from a sonata. The excerpt, which consists of two main sections, will be played three times. Before listening to the excerpt for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: In contrast to the end of the first section, the end of the second section contains

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
